summary: Previous feedback on stripping private JWK fields and implementing conditional ETag handling has been addressed correctly.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: JWKS response may leak private key fields
previous_issues_status.notes: Private fields are stripped via stripPrivateJwk before serialization.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: No conditional handling for If-None-Match / unsafe ETag comparison
previous_issues_status.notes: matchesEtag uses timingSafeEqual and returns 304 on match.
